languages.text: "После нашей с тобой охоты на него я отправлюсь на поиски иной, не менее славной добычи. Буду искать достойного соперника по всему Простору, наслаждаясь каждой новой схваткой".

traits.locale_text: "После нашей с тобой охоты на него я отправлюсь на поиски иной, не менее славной добычи. Буду искать достойного соперника по всему Простору, наслаждаясь каждой новой схваткой".
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."
languages.original_text: "После нашей с тобой охоты на него я отправлюсь на поиски иной, не менее славной добычи. Буду искать достойного соперника по всему Простору, наслаждаясь каждой новой схваткой".

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him I will set out to find out a new quarry, just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new engagement."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him I will set out to find out a new quarry, just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new engagement."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find out a new quarry, just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new venture."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find out a new quarry, just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new venture."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Cuando terminemos de cazarlo tendré que encontrar una nueva presa igual de gloriosa. Buscaré oponentes dignos por toda la Extensión, disfrutando de cada escaramuza».
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando terminemos de cazarlo tendré que encontrar una nueva presa igual de gloriosa. Buscaré oponentes dignos por toda la Extensión, disfrutando de cada aventura».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Une fois que nous en aurons terminé avec lui, je me mettrai en quête d'une nouvelle proie, tout aussi glorieuse que celle-ci. Je chercherai un adversaire digne de moi à travers toutes les Étendues et je savourerai chacune de ces escarmouches. »
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."

traits.locale_text: « Une fois que nous en aurons terminé avec lui, je me mettrai en quête d'une nouvelle proie, tout aussi glorieuse que celle-ci. Je chercherai un adversaire digne de moi à travers toutes les Étendues et je savourerai chacune de mes aventures. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「奴への狩りを終えたら、こいつと同じくらい素晴らしい、新しい獲物を求めて出発する。エクスパンス中で手ごたえのある敵を探し、新たな小競り合いを楽しむのさ」
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."

traits.locale_text: 「奴への狩りを終えたら、こいつと同じくらい素晴らしい、新しい獲物を求めて出発する。エクスパンス中で手ごたえのある敵を探し、新たな冒険を楽しむのさ」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “等咱们狩猎完卡尔卡扎之后，我会去找一片新的猎场，和这片猎场一样辉煌。我会在科罗努斯扩区找到另一位旗鼓相当的对手，享受每一场新的遭遇战。”
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."

traits.locale_text: “等咱们狩猎完卡尔卡扎之后，我会去找一片新的猎场，和这片猎场一样辉煌。我会在科罗努斯扩区找到另一位旗鼓相当的对手，享受每一场新的冒险。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Wenn die Jagd auf ihn beendet ist, ziehe ich aus, um eine neue Beute zu finden, eine ebenso glorreiche Beute. Ich werde in der gesamten Ausdehnung nach einem würdigen Gegner suchen und jedes neue Scharmützel genießen."
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Jagd auf ihn beendet ist, ziehe ich aus, um eine neue Beute zu finden, eine ebenso glorreiche Beute. Ich werde in der gesamten Ausdehnung nach einem würdigen Gegner suchen und jede neue Unternehmung genießen."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Onu avlamamız bittikten sonra kendime bunun kadar ihtişamlı başka bir av bulacağım ve ona doğru yola koyulacağım. Tüm Enginlik'te karşılaşmaya layık bir rakip arayacağım ve her yeni avın tadını sonuna kadar çıkaracağım."
languages.original_text: "After we are done hunting him, I will set out to find a new quarry just as glorious as this one. I will look for a worthy opponent all over the Expanse, enjoying every new skirmish."
